item.description:
We'll be enjoying the special event of Lilac Sunday at the Arnold Arboteum with some walking thru the Arboretum, starting at 11.30am followed by lunch at The Alchemist Lounge in JP at 1.30pm.

Lilac Sunday at the Arboretum

The Alchemist Lounge

We'll meet at 11.30am at the Visitors Center which is on the right shortly after you enter at the main gate on ArborWay. We'll stroll thru to the slopes where most of the Lilacs are grown, relax and enjoy the scenery, and then circle back to the main gate, from where we will depart for lunch.

Please RSVP Yes even if you can only make it to brunch/lunch since we need an accurate head-count for the reservation @ the Alchemist. If you are only coming to brunch/lunch, please mention this as a comment when you RSVP.

Thanks!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Tall blonde gal with a "funny" accent, standing on the top of the steps at the Visitors Center.
item.why: Great location and time of year for a walk, with a great bunch of tall single folks!
item.name: Lilac Sunday Walk in the Arnold Arboretum
